lockScreen.securityNote: Your data is protected with AES-256-GCM encryption

connection.title: Connect to Server
connection.savedServersHelp: Select a server to connect, or click Edit to load into the form.
connection.selectProtocolPrompt: Select a protocol above to configure your connection
connection.securityKeyring: AES-256-GCM encrypted vault — stored locally on your device
connection.securityEncryption: Optional master password with Argon2id key derivation
connection.securityNoSend: No cloud sync, no telemetry — your data stays on your machine
connection.securityTLS: TLS 1.3 / SSH encryption for all connections
connection.aerocloudConfigured: AeroCloud is already configured and syncing
connection.aerocloudDesc: Turn any FTP server into your personal cloud with automatic sync
connection.aerocloudHelp: You can also configure AeroCloud from the status bar
connection.selectProviderPrompt: Select a provider above or choose "Custom" for manual configuration

protocol.sshAuthHelp: Leave empty to use password authentication. For key-based auth, provide your private key path.
protocol.keyPassphraseHelp: Leave empty if key is not encrypted
protocol.webdavNote: WebDAV path should include the full path to your files. For Nextcloud use:
protocol.ftpWarningDesc: FTP transmits credentials and data in plain text. Consider using FTPS or SFTP for a secure connection.
protocol.encryptionExplicitIfAvailable: Use explicit FTP over TLS if available

browser.name: Name
browser.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?
browser.deleteConfirmMultiple: Are you sure you want to delete {count} items?

contextMenu.importMegaPrompt: Paste a MEGA public link to import:
contextMenu.enterArchivePassword: This archive is encrypted. Enter password:

settings.title: Settings
settings.showStatusBarDesc: Display connection info and statistics at the bottom
settings.showSystemMenuBarDesc: Show the native File/Edit/View menu at the top of the window
settings.toastNotificationsDesc: Display popup notifications for actions (errors always shown). Activity Log is always available.
settings.restartRequired: Restart may be required for full effect
settings.privacyDesc: Control your data and privacy settings
settings.analyticsDesc: Help improve AeroFTP by sharing: app version, language, and OS. No personal data or server information is ever collected.
settings.securityLocal: Passwords are stored locally on your device
settings.securityOAuth: OAuth tokens use secure file storage
settings.securityNoSend: No credentials are ever sent to external servers
settings.securityTLS: All connections use encryption when available
settings.includeCredentialsHint: Passwords and API keys will be encrypted in the file
settings.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
settings.masterPasswordDesc: Protect AeroFTP with a master password. The app will lock after inactivity and require your password to unlock.
settings.autoLockDesc: Lock the app automatically after this period of inactivity (0 = disabled)
settings.passwordRequirements: Minimum 8 characters. Use a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols for best security.
settings.confirmRemovePassword: Are you sure you want to remove master password protection? Your credentials will still be stored securely, but the app will no longer require a password to open.
settings.securityArgon2: Argon2id key derivation (128 MiB memory, 4 iterations)
settings.oauthNote: OAuth2 credentials are stored locally in your encrypted vault and never sent to AeroFTP servers.

ui.editPathNav: Click to edit path, Enter to navigate
ui.localPathMismatch: Local path doesn't match the connected server

cloud.title: AeroCloud
cloud.syncIntervalDesc: How often to sync files in the background
cloud.cloudNameDesc: Custom name displayed in the tab

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.helpText: Press [F1] anytime to show this dialog

toast.connectionLostManual: Could not reconnect. Please reconnect manually.
toast.fillEndpointCreds: Please fill in endpoint and credentials
toast.fillServerUser: Please fill in server and username

about.tagline: More than FTP. A complete developer toolkit.

support.title: Support AeroFTP
support.subtitle: Your support helps keep AeroFTP free!

folderOverwrite.title: Folder Already Exists
folderOverwrite.description: The destination folder already exists. Choose how to handle files inside:

migration.title: Secure Credential Migration
migration.warning: Your credentials are stored in plaintext
migration.warningDetail: Passwords and tokens will be migrated to your OS keychain for secure storage.
migration.keyringDetected: OS Keychain detected - credentials will be securely stored
migration.vaultMode: Using encrypted vault with master password
migration.skipWarning: Skipping will leave your credentials in plaintext files

masterPassword.setupInfo: Your credentials are already encrypted. The master password adds an extra layer of protection — you'll need to enter it when the app starts or after inactivity.
masterPassword.tooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

syncPanel.title: Synchronize Files
syncPanel.descRemoteToLocal: Checks which remote files are newer and downloads them to the local folder.
syncPanel.descLocalToRemote: Checks which local files are newer and uploads them to the remote server.
syncPanel.descBidirectional: Checks differences in both directions: downloads newer remote files and uploads newer local files.
syncPanel.clickCompare: Click "Compare Now" to scan for differences
syncPanel.indexAvailableTooltip: A sync index from a previous sync is available — conflict detection is enhanced

ai.speechNotSupported: Speech recognition is not supported in this browser.
ai.disclaimer: AI may make mistakes. Double-check code.
ai.welcome: Your AI-powered FTP assistant. I can help you manage files, analyze code, and execute operations.
ai.noModelSelected: No model selected. Click ⚙️ to configure a provider.
ai.noProvidersConfigured: No AI providers configured. Click ⚙️ to add one.
ai.apiKeyNotConfigured: API key not configured for {{provider}}. Open AI Settings to add one.
ai.rateLimitReached: Rate limit reached for {{provider}}. Try again in {{seconds}}s.
ai.errorAuth: Authentication failed. Check your API key in AI Settings.
ai.errorRateLimit: Rate limited by the provider. Wait a moment and try again.
ai.errorModelNotFound: Model not found. Check your model name in AI Settings.
ai.errorNetwork: Network error. Check your internet connection and provider URL.
ai.errorDefault: Make sure you have configured an AI provider in settings.
ai.executeApproval: I want to execute **{{tool}}**. Approve or cancel:

settings.title: AI Settings
settings.addProviderHint: Add a provider above to get started
settings.addProviderFirst: Add a provider first to manage models
settings.autoRoutingDescription: Automatically select the best model for each task type
settings.autoRoutingInstruction: Configure which model to use for each task type. When auto-routing is enabled, the AI will automatically select the appropriate model based on the task.
settings.autoRoutingTip: Tip: Leave as "Auto (Default)" to use the model selected in the chat header. Configure specific models only when you want different models for different tasks.
settings.advancedDescription: Configure advanced AI parameters for response generation.
settings.styleHelp: Precise = factual responses. Creative = more imaginative. Balanced = default.
settings.maxResponseHelp: Higher values allow longer responses but use more API credits.

vault.title: AeroVault
vault.description: AeroVault lets you create AES-256 encrypted containers to securely store your files.
vault.descriptionV2: AeroVault v2 provides military-grade encryption with nonce misuse-resistant AES-256-GCM-SIV and optional cascade encryption.
vault.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
vault.empty: Vault is empty. Add files to get started.

cryptomator.title: Cryptomator Vault
cryptomator.description: Open a Cryptomator vault (format 8) to browse and decrypt files.
cryptomator.readOnly: Read-only mode — vault creation coming in v2.1
cryptomator.name: Name

batchRename.title: Batch Rename
batchRename.conflictWarning: Some files would have the same name. Please adjust the pattern.
